title: Process a Tuition Reimbursement Request
description: An employee has completed a course and is submitting for tuition reimbursement under the company policy.

tasks.description: Receive the employee's reimbursement request, including their grades and receipts.
tasks.expected_outcome: L&D specialist receives the completed request packet.

tasks.description: Verify that the employee met the policy requirements (e.g., passed with a 'B' or better).
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist confirms the employee is eligible for reimbursement.

tasks.description: Submit the reimbursement request to payroll for processing in the next pay cycle.
tasks.expected_outcome: Specialist approves the request and forwards it to the payroll department.
